edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.installer

Class JarUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.installer.JarUtilities

  • public final class JarUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for common operations on JAR files
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentlyRunningJarUrl

        public static java.net.URL getCurrentlyRunningJarUrl()
        Gets the currently running jar file as URL. This method works only if the JarUtilities class is bundled within the same jar.
        Returns:
        The currently running jar file, null if not running from jar

      • generateUrl

        public static java.net.URL generateUrl(java.io.File jarFile)
        Creates a jar url for a given jar file
        Parameters:
        jarFile - The jar file
        Returns:
        The url, null in case of any error

      • getCurrentlyRunningJarFile

        public static java.io.File getCurrentlyRunningJarFile()
        Gets the folder of the currently running jar file. This method works only if the JarUtilities class is bundled within the same jar.
        Returns:
        The currently running jar file, null if not running from jar

      • extractFolder

        public static boolean extractFolder(java.net.URL jarUrl,
                                    java.lang.String relativePath,
                                    java.io.File targetFolder)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        jarUrl - The path to the JAR as URL
        relativePath - The relative path within the JAR to extract the files from
        targetFolder - The target folder to extract the content to
        Returns:
        true if everything was extracted successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on any IO error
